TASK: Craft an item of type: smithing_table
inventory=[{"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "packed_ice", "quantity": 12, "index": 11}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "stripped_warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "iron_ore", "quantity": 2, "index": 25}, {"type": "lodestone", "quantity": 45, "index": 29}, {"type": "acacia_stairs", "quantity": 33, "index": 34}, {"type": "jigsaw", "quantity": 62, "index": 37}, {"type": "iron_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "brown_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 63, "index": 42}, {"type": "light_gray_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 60, "index": 44}, {"type": "salmon_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]

thought: The current goal is to craft a smithing_table, which requires iron_ingot and warped_planks. Since there is no iron_ingot in the inventory, we must craft it from iron_ore. To do this, we must smelt the iron_ore at slot 25 into an empty slot (eg., 26). However, before we can smelt the iron_ore, we need to make sure that there is a free slot in the inventory. Therefore, we will move the stripped_crimson_stem at slot 24 to slot 1, which is currently occupied by oak_planks.
Ok
act: move from slot 24 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: Now that we have freed up a slot in the inventory, we can move the iron_ore from slot 25 to the empty slot 26. This will allow us to smelt the iron_ore into iron_ingot. After smelting, we can then use the iron_ingot to craft the smithing_table.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4
